articles.title: Rumoured smartphone launches in April 2024: Realme GT 5 Pro, Samsung Galaxy M55 and more - HT Tech
articles.description: As April unfolds, anticipation surges among Indian tech enthusiasts as major smartphone brands gear up to unveil their latest offerings. From Motorola's flagship Edge 50 Pro to Samsung's mid-range contender, the Galaxy M55, know what's launching soon.

articles.title: NASA alert: Three asteroids to pass Earth by a narrow margin; Check speed, size and more - HT Tech
articles.description: As many as three asteroids will pass Earth by a narrow margin today, NASA has revealed. From size, speed to distance of approach, know all about these close encounters.
articles.content: In the last few months, asteroid flybys have become a common occurrence. These space rocks, also known as minor planets, are rocky, airless remnants of the early formation of our solar system about 4… [+2655 chars]

articles.title: NASA's Curiosity Rover Unearths Mars' Ancient Water Secrets - SciTechDaily
articles.description: The rover has arrived at an area that may show evidence liquid water flowed on this part of Mars for much longer than previously thought. NASA’s Curiosity rover has begun exploring a new region of Mars, one that could reveal more about when liquid water disap…
articles.content: Curiosity’s exploration of the Gediz Vallis channel on Mars offers new insights into the planet’s past, revealing a potential history of water flows and climatic changes that challenge previous belie… [+5081 chars]
